Hello, I'm Promit!

I'm currently pursuing a Bachelor of Science in computer science and statistics at Memorial University of Newfoundland. I have a passion for building software that combines data, creativity, and problem solving. When I'm not coding or analysing datasets, you can find me exploring the latest in web development or experimenting with new visualisation techniques.

This portfolio showcases some of the projects I've worked on and the lessons I've learned. Through my blog posts, I aim to share insights on algorithms, data analysis, programming best practices, and personal reflections on navigating a career in tech.

If you'd like to connect, feel free to reach out via the contact page or through any of the social links provided.
